entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
